title: What if all ADC's had a reload time/ammo?
body:
And depending on the amount of ammo they have, it would determine whether the ADC is more so focused on burst or sustained damage.
For example, Jhin uses 4 bullets and must reload after each, therefore he focuses on more bursts of damage with a lot of AD and his 4th bullet boost.

Then you can give Caitlyn 9-10 bullets and she must reload afterwards, allowing her to shoot more, but she is an overall less bursty champ.

I feel these restrictions on marksman autoattacks would make them both unique and effectively dwindle down the complaints about ADC's.

Thoughts?
